rawContent: Isabella is a extreme example and a troll, but there is a real fear in some circles that certain activities cause homosexuality or sexual sin. I was once told not to let Jason brush our daughter’s hair because he might turn into a sexual predator, and I knew a gal who banned soy from her household because she believed it would make her husband and sons gay. These … phobias? myths? … expose a complete lack of trust in a man’s intelligence, moral character, and personal agency. It’s this same mentality that blames the victim when abuse occurs. “What were you wearing? What did you do to make him act like that?” In a bizarre twist of irony, Patriarchy (misogyny marketed as religion) denies men’s mental capacity and moral integrity to make basic decisions and faithfully husband and father their families. And tragically, because people like Isabella call themselves Christians, they undermine the church’s ability to effectively influence culture on major issues such as masculinity and sexuality, because they bias unbelievers against us with their fruitcake ideology.
